task.title: Task: SUMIF
task.shortdesc: A task in which you learn how you can add numbers that meet certain conditions.

context.p: The SUMIF function can be used to add numbers under certain conditions. The spreadsheet has a list of the yields of different coffee types per month and per region. You need to determine the total yields per region.

step.cmd: Select cell H2 and press the button Insert Function on the formula bar.
Select in the All category the function SUMIF and click on OK.
step.stepresult: The Function Arguments dialog box appears.

step.cmd: Put the cursor in the Range box and select column C. Then put the cursor in the Criteria box and select cell G2. Finally, put the cursor in the Sum_range box and select column D.

step.stepresult: The total yield for region North 743140 now appears in cell H2.

step.cmd: Select cell H2 and drag down the fill handle to H5.
Format the numbers in H2:H5 as currencies.
